description: This funnel-neck sherpa sweater will keep you warm, no matter where your adventure takes you. Thanks to its Bluesign®-certified Polartec®Shearling Fleece Thermal Pro® fabric, this cozy top wicks moisture and retains heat, keeping you comfortably dry. It can easily be worn on its own or as a second layer to maximize your cold-weather comfort. Whether you're climbing awe-inspiring peaks or enjoying a delicious hot coffee at dawn from the comfort of your tent, this sherpa sweater will quickly become a must-have for your nature escapades.
name: Pecora Sweater - Womens
